name: Lost in the Neighborhood
description:
Lost in the Neighborhood is a VHS style horror game. You need to go home before midnight, but something is lurking in the streets.

In the game you need to solve puzzles and survive the horror that awaits you!

Controls:

Wasd: Movement

Shift: Run

Space: Jump

LMB: Interact

F: on/off Flashlight

Esc: Leave

N: on/off Fullscreen

M: Maximize window
